        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,MCOMachineState>> parseMCOYumList(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> mcoOutput)
        Parses output from MCO and Yum into a set of environment states
        Parameters:
        mcoOutput - The output from MCO and Yum containing the list of packages per machine, as a map of servername vs output.
        Returns:
        A map of the environments, and their machines.

      • parsePackages

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parsePackages(java.lang.String mcoOutputForMachine)
        Parses the packages for a machine
        Parameters:
        mcoOutputForMachine - - the package list output from Yum
        Returns:
        a Map where componentName is the key and a map of properties of that component (eg, its version) are the value.
